InsuranceForm.title: Apply for Insurance
InsuranceForm.error: An error occurred while submitting the form
InsuranceForm.selectInsuranceType: Please select an insurance type to continue
InsuranceForm.success: Your insurance application has been submitted successfully!
InsuranceForm.stateSelectionNote: Note: State selection requires country selection. API endpoint for states is not implemented.

SubmissionsList.title: Your Applications
SubmissionsList.warningTooltip: Click to learn more about local submissions
SubmissionsList.warningMessage: Due to backend limitations, your submissions are stored locally in your browser. This means they will only be visible on this device and will be cleared if you clear your browser data. The server data shown is for demonstration purposes only.
SubmissionsList.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this submission? This action cannot be undone.
